title: Creative Summoners Union | Pre-launch interest?
body:
Yo, so making a thing for Creative summoners who like to make things within League of Legends, or anywhere nerdy ( with a focus on League of Legends content of course )

It'll be for sharing, improving, learning, collaborating, that sort of thing.

We're looking for artists, musicians, editors, cosplayers, writers, and anyone that makes or does Creative things.

If interested, throw me an add on League of Legends, or just drop a message here about who you are and what you do. :)
